ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Question about other NPC's killing things.
ygData.msgSnippet: well, my problem was not that I ran to the guard but that either a guard wandered by or the mob I was fighting ran to the guards to get away from me. it was
ygData.messageBody:
well, my problem was not that I ran to the guard but that either a guard
wandered by or the mob I was fighting ran to the guards to get away from me.
it was especially bad with dwarf bandits in ButcherBlock.
It made no sense to me why the mobs would run to an enemy NPC. It was like
they did it just to spite me bc they knew I wouldn't get the xp.
luv,
-Su

> Well, yes I admit it.
>
> I am sarcastic. My most recent outbreak was most likely caused by your
> short one word response with no other information added.
>
> I'll try it tonight, maybe they changed the way it worked but I know it
use
> to be the way I described it. Doesnt anyone else remember running to the
> guards when they were lower lvl and almost killing a mob only to have
> another jump you. So off you scurry to the guards and they wax both of
the
> mobs including the one you had to a sliver of life and you lose your kill.
> Happened to me quite often in Gfay. With Orcs near the hills.
>
> Mu
>
> Also I prefer to call my inflated self worth, high self esteem = P
>
